dcterms:description: A multi-site, multi-vendor UK trial dataset containing anonymised 2D echocardiograms, including both stress and rest images, used for view classification in cardiac ultrasound.
dcterms:title: EVAREST

dcterms:description: A public dataset used for training models in video-based AI for beat-to-beat assessment of cardiac function.
dcterms:title: EchoNet

dcterms:description: General mention of public datasets used for echocardiographic view classification.
dcterms:title: Public datasets
